{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Linksys |model=WRT54G |revision=v7.2 |series=WRT54G |serialnum_prefix=CDFK |is_manuf=No |manuf=CyberTAN |type=wireless router |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=0.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM5354 |fla1=2 |ram1=8 |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM5354 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=100M |wan_ports=1 |tp_firmware=DD-WRT |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ch= }} {{TagLine|Wireless-G Broadband Router}} "3763-14141905R" is silkscreened on the board according to the picture on TechInfoDepot below. This is the same board ID as the [[Linksys WRT54G v8.0]]. {{TechInfoDepot|Linksys_WRT54G_v7.2}}
